content:
# The error indicates that we are still unable to craft the assembling machine due to the same issue regarding the requirement for an intermediate iron plate.
# 
# This suggests that we need to have a specific crafting machine available to produce the iron gear wheel and the assembling machine itself. 
# Given that we do not have any crafting machines yet, we need to focus on producing the necessary components using the stone furnace.
#
# Let's go back to our original plan of smelting more iron ore to gather additional iron plates, which will allow us to craft the necessary items once we have enough resources.

# We currently have:
# - 10 iron ore
# - 10 coal
# 
# Let's proceed to smelt these iron ores into plates.

# Insert coal into the furnace for fuel.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 units of coal into the furnace.
# Then, insert the remaining 10 units of iron ore into the furnace to start smelting.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert all 10 units of iron ore.
print(f"Inventory after inserting items into the furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory one more time.
print(f"Current furnace status after inserting: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}")  # Check the current status of the furnace to verify.
